content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -13.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5).

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of a lab (position -17.5, 23.5).

### Pipe network
Consists of multiple pipe groups connecting various entities, with the following notable connections:
- PipeGroup (fluid system 38001) at position (-18.5, 16.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid system 38004) at position (-12.5, 21.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid system 38007) at position (-9.5, 21.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid system 38012) at position (-10.5, 22.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid system 38013) at position (-6.5, 23.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when harvesting resources
- Ensure you are within reach of the resource you want to harvest before attempting to harvest it. 

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. 

### Errors related to power connections
- Check that all power-consuming entities (like steam engines and labs) are properly connected to a power network to avoid "not connected to power network" warnings. 

### Errors related to fuel supply
- Ensure that boilers have fuel supplied to them to avoid "out of fuel" warnings. 

### Errors related to ingredient availability
- Make sure that furnaces have the necessary ingredients to operate, as indicated by "no ingredients to smelt" warnings.
